item.title: Wisconsin shows Civil Wardrobe some love!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
Sequentially Speaking has nothing but good things to say about our latest book.
It's really a fun parody that pokes fun at the current comic book status-quo a little bit. And who can't laugh at it, right? If you haven't picked it up and you're in the mood for a good laugh, you should check it out.
Lisa from Sequentially Speaking owns Neptune Comics in Wisconsin, go visit them if your in town.
